body_text: Hi Rishabh Raj, The brief stands incomplete, there is no copy mentioned for this.    Pls give proper briefs for us to pick them on time and avoid delays. Also, if you are marking briefs urgent then  pls do give a call to get them on priority.  ​  ​Regards,  Priya
body:
Hi Rishabh Raj,
The brief stands incomplete, there is no copy mentioned for this. 

Pls give proper briefs for us to pick them on time and avoid delays. Also, if you are marking briefs urgent then  pls do give a call to get them on priority. 
​
​Regards,
Priya
